title: Evil Spirits, Exorcisms and Ouija Boards - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/9/17
itunes:title: Evil Spirits, Exorcisms and Ouija Boards - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/9/17
description:
George Noory and psychic medium Chip Coffey discuss his work as a paranormal researcher, examining spirits that communicate from the afterlife and whether people should use ouija boards to contact them.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
